title: TUXEDO Pulse 14 Gen3 Linux Laptop Unveiled with AMD Ryzen 7 7840HS CPU
description:
TUXEDO Pulse 14 Gen 3 Linux laptop is now available for pre-order with AMD Ryzen 7 7840HS CPU, 32 GB DDR5 RAM, and 3K display.

The post TUXEDO Pulse 14 Gen3 Linux Laptop Unveiled with AMD Ryzen 7 7840HS CPU appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.

title: FFmpeg 6.1 “Heaviside” Released with VAAPI AV1 Encoder, HW Vulkan Decoding
description:
FFmpeg 6.1 open-source multimedia framework is now available for download with VAAPI AV1 encoder, hardware accelerated Vulkan decoding, new filters, new decoders, new demuxers, and more.

The post FFmpeg 6.1 “Heaviside” Released with VAAPI AV1 Encoder, HW Vulkan Decoding appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
